summary: A collection of unit tests that validate the correct handling of many‑to‑many relationships defined with an explicit intermediate (through) model in Django, covering prohibited direct modifications, relationship clearing, custom related names, and querying through intermediate fields.
business_intent: Guarantee that applications using through models respect Django's constraints on relationship manipulation, can perform accurate queries and ordering via intermediate attributes, and support custom related names without conflicts, thereby preventing runtime errors and ensuring data integrity.
